name: The U bar and grill
address: 1207 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA

reviews.text: Chanty was awesome!

Great spot in Amsterdam near Columbia. Had a good lunch and service was excellent. Our server Heidy was great!
Chanty the waitress has a huge personality and wit about her. She kept it fun and was a great vibe. Def coming back

U-Bar is exactly what this neighborhood needed. The owners are the same people behind the iconic Inwood Bar on Dyckman, and they brought that same Uptown soul to a whole new crowd. You get this incredible mix of Columbia University students, neighborhood locals, and true Dominican hicks it‚Äôs an energy that feels completely unique and totally authentic.

The vibe is electric. The staff is amazing, attentive, and full of personality. Every server is beautiful and knows how to make you feel welcome. Guillermo, the manager, runs the place perfectly and you can tell he takes pride in every detail.

The food is top tier. I had the oxtail and the wings, and the oxtail was honestly the best I‚Äôve ever had anywhere. The wings were just as good. Everything was full of flavor and cooked to perfection.

If you‚Äôre into sports, this place is heaven. There must be around 50 TVs and two of them are literally the size of a movie screen. Every game, every sport, every highlight they‚Äôve got it all.

Nothing like this has ever existed in this area. U-Bar is going to be a huge success. The owners did an incredible job.
Chanty outstanding service what a great vibe personality good drinks everything but chanti MADE IT EVEN BETTER SHE IS A AMAZING SERVER
Chanty is a great server, always greeting us with great attention.
Yury was an amazing, welcoming and pleasant waitress! Coming back just because of her!
absolute favorite bar in morningside heights! Yury is an angel
The service was amazing! The happy hour deals are great. Yury was the best !!
Come see Yury!!!! She‚Äôs amazing ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Buffalo wings could be spicier
The food here is really good. Heidi is a very attentive server. She recommended me to try yellow rice. I love this place!
Comida rica y atenci√≥n excelente y muy r√°pida. Heidi muy simp√°tica y servicial.

U Bar & Grill is definitely a hidden gem near Columbia University! Their happy hour specials are to die for, $3 tacos and $7 frozen margaritas that are absolutely delicious and refreshing! On Wednesdays, they make it even better with $1 wings that are packed with flavor and cooked to perfection.

They also have a private lounge where you can party, vibe with friends, and enjoy some hookah in a laid-back atmosphere. The food was fresh and flavorful, and the employees were extremely friendly and welcoming.

If you‚Äôre in the area and looking for a fun spot with amazing deals, great vibes, and tasty food, U Bar & Grill is the place to be!

The U Bar is amazing! The food and service are top notch and it‚Äôs always a great experience. Servers and hostess are personable and make the atmosphere that much better. The portions are great and food is fresh, you can tell it is made to order. Not to mention their unbelievable lunch specials! Will 100% recommend!

Ramon is the absolute best! Great service, great food AND great drinks. Their guava and mango margarita is so good and I definitely recommend getting the Venezuelan Teque√±os. 10/10 and will be coming back!

I went here for Happy Hour at 3pm waiting for my girlfriend to join me at 5pm. Varenia, the bartender was very friendly and helpful.  She was on point with no wait time.  I ordered the Chicharron de Pollo and it was excellent.   Happy hour deals cannot be beat with $4 beers and $7 Sangria.  The hostess, Heidi, was extremely friendly and recommended the Mango White Sangria which was excellent. Overall, I give this place 5 stars for value, atmosphere,  and friendly customer service.

This spot is a great choice for basketball and football season‚Äîit has plenty of TVs and comfortable bar seating. It‚Äôs owned by the same people behind Inwood Bar in the Heights, so if you‚Äôre familiar with that vibe, you‚Äôll feel right at home.

They offer an all-day happy hour on Tuesdays with a solid deal: one drink and five tacos for $20. The drinks and food were both good, and I‚Äôd definitely go back.

My only complaint is the music‚Äîthey had the Latin music blasting while the American music was so low you could barely hear it. Still, the overall vibe was good and prices were reasonable. You can have a great time here for around $60.
Guillermo general manager and our server chanty was so awesome ‚Ä¶.  Ladies Thursday  HAPPY HOUR ALL NIGHT‚Ä¶. FOOD IS AMAZING ü§©
Service, food and staff were outstanding. Very good ambiance and great drinks.

Amazing food, awesome customer service and just and all around good spot to enjoy a good game with your people.

10/10 highly recommend

This place is really unique , beautiful, good happy hour and great food . The atmosphere is great the music is at a nice level . Customer service is amazing , keep it up. The drinks are good, specially the pi√±a colada .  Love the decor of this place really sporty .

The servers were very attentive the space was bigger than I expected, the bathroom setup is great as well plus they have a handicapped accessible one as well, and they have a hidden lounge area as well the food was delectable as well.

First time here and it was amazing !! My dad saw this place on instagram and he wanted to check it out. We was able to be assisted by the beautiful Chanty which she delivered amazing customer service when it came to our food and drinks. When I tell you they have everything here down to seafood, pasta and steak it definitely lived up to their add on instagram. They do have a private lounge so if you ever wanna order hookah and bottle service they have that option. Will be coming back to experience a game or even a night out thank you again for this amazing experience ü´∂üèΩ

This is my 3rd time coming to this establishment and I must say I‚Äôm immensely impressed! That‚Äôs why I keep coming back:). Chanti our server was a wonderful and very personable person. She was very approachable and accommodating.

We can here on Taco Tuesday and truly enjoyed the food, but let‚Äôs get into the service‚Ä¶
Definitely great! We had Shanti (hope I spelled that correctly), she was amazing. Super sweet and kind. Definitely recommend having her help you 100% and yes to an allergy concerned queen! Not only did she interact with us but even recommended certain foods and drinks. No regrets at all. We will definitely be returning (so long as she‚Äôs here)!!! üôèüèºü´∂üèº
Ambiente fabuloso, personal amigable. Heidi y Chanty nos atendi√≥ de mil maravillas. La comida estuvo delicioso.
Food was INCREDIBLE! And coffee can‚Äôt be missed.  My favorite new restaurant.
Ramon was excellent , food was excellent and so were the drinks

I LOVED THE TACO TUESDAY!!! THE BIRRIA WAS REALLY GOOD AND THE CHICKEN TINGA TOO‚Ä¶ THE FISH ONE TOOüòùüòùüòùüòù ALL OF THEM! THE LAVA CAKE WAS NICE! THE BEST PART WAS GETTING AGUSTIN AND CHANTY, OUR WAITRESS ! SHE MADE US FEEL WELCOMED, EXPLAINED EVERYTHING AND OFFERED THE SPECIALS FOR OUR CONVENIENCE! EXCELLENT SERVICE! THE GUYS WERE ALWAYS ASKING IF EVERYTHING WAS FINE. DEFINITELY I WILL COME BACK TO EXPLORE THE OTHER ACTIVITIES THAT U BAR AND GRILL HAS DURING THE WEEK. CHANTY! THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING ! YOU MADE OUR NIGHT!ü•∞

Great happy hour for food and drinks on Tuesdays. It‚Äôs buy one get one free, got the sliders and onion rings with my friend and we shared the food. Although it was the appetizer that was part of the happy hour. The portions were decent and filling. Good music, nice ambience and felt like a sports bar with Latin spice thrown in. New favorite spot.

Super nice bar in a very cool space. Drinks are fantastic and the food is also great!! There‚Äôs a hookah lounge in the back and happy hour is incredible. The service was fantastic (especially Marchelle, who took amazing care of our huge party of 15 for several hours and even gave us all free shots!). Highly recommend!!
Good food and excellent price. Chanty was so awesome and gave us good recommendations which I loved. Coconut mojito was delicious!

Finally the wait is over,what an AMAZING !restaurant, the best addition to the columbia community. Food was delicious at very reasonable prices. SERVICE  WAS  SUPER GREAT  ,our waiter was YEIDY  was awesome, cant wait to return,.visited with colleagues and we all agreed, our new favorite restaurant,  Thanks .

The u bar and grill was so amazing. The customer service from chanty was out of this world. Will be coming back again for the food and ambience 10/10 service overall and I do appreciate everything this place has to offer !!
Everyone were so kind and attentive.  The drinks and food were very good. Chanty, was fabulous.  She was always asking if we were good.
Great atmosphere! The drinks were spot on, and the tacos were absolutely delicious. Loved the vibe‚Äîdefinitely coming back!

Heidi was absolutely amazing! From the moment we sat down, she made us feel welcome with her warm smile and polite, professional attitude. She was attentive without being overbearing and made sure everything was perfect throughout our meal. On top of her excellent service, she‚Äôs also incredibly gorgeous, which just added to the overall experience. Thank you, Heidi, for making our visit so enjoyable!

Always a great time at U Bar and Grill! Carlos and Michelle go above and beyond to make sure everyone feels welcome. Great service, great vibes‚Äîhighly recommend! If you‚Äôre lucky to grab a seat at the bar and be served by either two, enjoy the taco Tuesday special and watch all the games playing on the multiple big screens.

Came for the Love Island Watch Party, and The U Bar N Grill really outdid themselves! From the moment I walked in, everything was on point. No wait, no chaos‚Äîjust straight vibes. The event was super organized, the space was clean and polished, and the energy was everything.

The owner came through multiple times to check on my party, which honestly just made it feel like family. You can tell they care about their guests and take pride in the place. Our waitress was attentive, quick, and made sure we never needed to ask for anything twice.

Now let‚Äôs talk about that food‚ÄîSPECTACULAR. Everything was cooked to perfection, seasoned just right, and served hot and fresh. The hookah? Bussing. Not harsh, smooth pulls, and flavors that actually hit.

The whole night flowed perfectly. No complaints, no confusion‚Äîjust great people, great service, and bomb food. I‚Äôll definitely be back. FOR SURE! If you haven‚Äôt been to The U Bar N Grill yet, you‚Äôre missing out.

Thank you Eddy & the lovey ladies for the service!! See you soon!

Heidi was my server and she was absolutely wonderful‚Ä¶sweet, knowledgeable, and super friendly. I really loved the vibes here; the atmosphere is welcoming and relaxed. The sliders were fantastic a solid 10/10. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!
Chanty was the goat üêê her dimples are so perfect and her customer service is the cherry on top!
Thanks Ramon for the great service, and attention. Definitely recommend the service and the place
Service was great! Heidi was amazing! I will look for her EVERYTIME I come here. Food was good 4/5 because the soft tacos were hard but the meat and flavoring was amazing! All in all I give them 8/10

The U Bar and Grill is the kind of place that wins you over from the start. It‚Äôs a modern and vibrant sports bar, perfect for catching a game while enjoying great food and an energetic atmosphere. The dishes are flavorful, well presented, and generously served‚Äîeach bite reflects care and great seasoning, ideal for those who enjoy an authentic and relaxed dining experience.

They also offer a great space for private events, whether it‚Äôs a birthday, a small celebration, a gathering, or a special occasion. The service is friendly and efficient, making you feel welcome from the moment you walk in.

It‚Äôs definitely a place that‚Äôs worth visiting and one that everyone will enjoy. Whether it‚Äôs for the food, the sports vibe, or the event space, The U Bar and Grill is truly a great spot you‚Äôll want to come back to again and again.
Excelente ambiente, comida riquisima y un servicio increible. Yury, la chica que nos atendio trato super bien, Definitivamente vamos a volver
Excelente servicio , comida deliciosa , los tragos en su punto , les recomiendo los tacos de los martes. El sushi  espectacular!! Lo recomiendo totalmente üíØ

Chanty was our waitress. Very nice and extremely outgoing. This place is about month old. The place is well done. Very sports friendly. Super happy hr is great. The food is completely out of this world. Taco Tuesdays is sick....omg. 5 tacos and margarita 20 bucks. 1 dollar shots. They also have a downstairs lounge and no mandatory bottle for the table. D.j. in set. This place also has a Dominican flavor on the food. Definitely would go back.
The Food here is top class. Tacos are excellent, especially the Birria ones, great lunch menu and great staff, great deals.

Chanty was awesome . She was very kind and respectful. She made sure we were comfortable and was consistent if we needed anything she made sure we were good. I will be back because of the experience she gave me and my friend. The service was amazing and will come again.

Chanty made my afternoon truly better than my morning by her attentiveness, knowledge and wonderful social skills upon my arrival, and throughout my stay. She is honest, very quiet and her opinions about food menu are things I trust by now. I am grateful for Chanty‚Äôs hospitality and the rest of U Bar personal.

The service here was absolutely amazing! Everyone from the host, to the waiter, to the Manager was attentive, kind, and accommodating. Our server, Christian, was so knowledgeable about the menu and he made sure I knew about their amazing THURSDAY LADIES NIGHT HAPPY HOUR SPECIAL! My favorite part was when I ordered something I wasn‚Äôt fond of. Christian immediately put in a new order for me, the manager  came out and checked on me, the kitchen rushed ordered a new meal, and they even gave me a shot! Whoever is responsible for the entire business model and hiring process here is excelling. U bar can have my money every Thursday üíï

The service is great and the atmosphere is a typical sports bar atmosphere but loud

The food, however...

I've only tried the 5 dollar lunches (because who could turn down a five dollar meal in this area), so maybe these are their weakest dishes, but they are underwhelming at best.

The beef stroganoff was fine, as were the two fish dishes.

I cannot recommend the chicken dishes at all. The chicken is absurdly dry. I was most surprised that the roasted chicken was dry, because it was a chicken leg. I didn't even know it was possible to overcook a chicken leg, but this was overcooked to the point that it was like chewing on cardboard.

The portions are good, but that chicken...it does not at all make me want to try any of the other food. Even at 5 dollars, not worth it.
Excellent attention, a pleasant and quiet atmosphere, super delicious food, thanks to U bar and grill.
Amazing service!! Chanty provided us with amazing service. She was so kind, welcoming and attentive. Food was 10/10 as well. Definitely will be back!! Thank you Chantyyyy!!
